info.title: TaskPRO
info.description:
TaskPro Backend API
 This is the documentation of the TaskPro Backend API project, which provides an API for interacting with the TaskPro application.
 
This project implements the server part of the TaskPro application. It is built on Node.js, using the Express.js framework to implement the API and Mongoose to interact with the MongoDB database.
 
 _
 
 Requirements

 Before starting work with the project, make sure that the following tools are installed on your computer:
 Node.js (version 12 or higher) 
 
 _
 
 Installation
 
 Clone this repository to your local computer.
 Open a terminal and navigate to the root of your project.
 Run npm install or yarn to install project dependencies.
Configuration
Create an .env file in the root of your project.
Specify the required environment variables in this file.
